name: Boston Interactive
overview:
Boston Interactive (formerly Boston Web Design) is a web strategy, design and interactive marketing firm focused on creating effective web-based solutions that deliver a positive impact for your business.

Founded in 1999, Boston Interactive has successfully implemented custom interactive solutions for hundreds of clients, ranging from small startups to Fortune 500 corporations. With experience and expertise spanning numerous industries including healthcare, biotech, high technology, and non-profit, Boston Interactive continuously brings to businesses its customized approach and award-winning interactive services.

Clients include Genzyme, The ASPCA, FAO Schwarz, Forrester Research, and hundreds of other Non Profit, Biotech, Medical, and Retail organizations. More information about Boston Interactive can be found at www.bostoninteractive.com.
